nodes.id: 中国商用飞机有限责任公司

zh-cn: 中国商用飞机有限责任公司
en: Commercial Aircraft Corporation of China, Ltd.

location.zh-cn: 中国上海市浦东新区世博大道1919号
location.en: 1919 Expo Avenue, Pudong New Area, Shanghai, China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国研制大型民航飞机的中央企业，目标是成为拥有自主知识产权和国际竞争力的大型宽体民用飞机制造商。
description.en: A central state-owned enterprise of the People's Republic of China that develops large civil aircraft, aiming to become a manufacturer of large wide-body civil aircraft with independent intellectual property rights and international competitiveness.

description.zh-cn: 中国商用飞机有限责任公司董事长。
description.en: Chairman of the Commercial Aircraft Corporation of China, Ltd.

description.zh-cn: 中国商用飞机有限责任公司总经理。
description.en: General Manager of the Commercial Aircraft Corporation of China, Ltd.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任国务院总理。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, former Premier of the State Council.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 国务院国有资产监督管理委员会

zh-cn: 国务院国有资产监督管理委员会
en: State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的特设直属机构，代表国家履行出资人职责。
description.en: A special directly-affiliated institution under the State Council of the People's Republic of China, which performs the responsibilities of an investor on behalf of the state.

nodes.id: 上海国盛（集团）有限公司

zh-cn: 上海国盛（集团）有限公司

description.zh-cn: 代表上海市人民政府出资的国有独资企业。
description.en: A wholly state-owned enterprise that makes investments on behalf of the Shanghai Municipal People's Government.

zh-cn: 中国航空工业集团公司

description.zh-cn: 中国一家主要航空制造公司。
description.en: A major Chinese aerospace and defense conglomerate.

zh-cn: 中国宝武钢铁集团有限公司
en: China Baowu Steel Group Corporation Limited

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆规模最大的钢铁企业。
description.en: The largest steel producer in mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆最大的氧化铝及原铝生产商。
description.en: The largest producer of alumina and primary aluminum in mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 中国一家主要化工企业。
description.en: A major Chinese chemical conglomerate.

description.zh-cn: 美利坚合众国的联邦政府。
description.en: The federal government of the United States of America.

zh-cn: 中国商飞设计研发中心
en: Shanghai Aircraft Design and Research Institute

description.zh-cn: 中国商用飞机有限责任公司下属的设计研发中心。
description.en: The design and research center of COMAC.

zh-cn: 上海飞机制造有限公司
中国商飞总装制造中心

description.zh-cn: 中国商用飞机有限责任公司下属的总装制造中心。
description.en: The final assembly and manufacturing center of COMAC.

中国商飞客户服务中心
en: Shanghai Aircraft Customer Service Co., Ltd.

description.zh-cn: 中国商用飞机有限责任公司下属的客户服务中心。
description.en: The customer service center of COMAC.

description.zh-cn: 一家在香港提供飞机工程及维修服务的公司。
description.en: A company providing aircraft engineering and maintenance services in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 上海市的最高地方行政机关。
description.en: The highest local administrative organ of Shanghai.

relationships.target: 中国商用飞机有限责任公司

description.zh-cn: 贺东风担任中国商用飞机有限责任公司董事长。
description.en: He Dongfeng serves as the Chairman of the Commercial Aircraft Corporation of China, Ltd.

relationships.target: 中国商用飞机有限责任公司

description.zh-cn: 周新民担任中国商用飞机有限责任公司总经理。
description.en: Zhou Xinmin serves as the General Manager of the Commercial Aircraft Corporation of China, Ltd.

relationships.target: 中国商用飞机有限责任公司

description.zh-cn: 时任国务院总理温家宝主持召开国务院常务会议，原则批准大型飞机研制重大科技专项正式立项，同意组建大型客机股份公司，从而推动了中国商飞的成立。
description.en: Then-Premier Wen Jiabao chaired an executive meeting of the State Council, which approved in principle the formal establishment of a major science and technology project for the development of large aircraft and agreed to form a large passenger aircraft joint-stock company, thus promoting the establishment of COMAC.

relationships.source: 中国商用飞机有限责任公司
relationships.target: 国务院国有资产监督管理委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国商用飞机有限责任公司是中央企业，由国务院国资委代表国务院履行出资人职责。
description.en: COMAC is a central state-owned enterprise, with SASAC performing the duties of an investor on behalf of the State Council.

relationships.source: 国务院国有资产监督管理委员会
relationships.target: 中国商用飞机有限责任公司

description.zh-cn: 代表中华人民共和国国务院出资60亿元人民币，占股31.58%，参与创立中国商用飞机有限责任公司。
description.en: Representing the State Council of the People's Republic of China, invested 6 billion RMB, accounting for a 31.58% stake, to participate in the founding of COMAC.

description.en: Representing the Shanghai Municipal People's Government, invested 5 billion RMB, accounting for a 26.32% stake, to participate in the founding of COMAC.

description.en: Invested 5 billion RMB in assets and cash, accounting for a 26.32% stake, to participate in the founding of COMAC.

description.en: Invested 1 billion RMB in cash, accounting for a 5.26% stake, to participate in the founding of COMAC.

relationships.target: 中国商用飞机有限责任公司

description.zh-cn: 美国政府将中国商飞列为中国人民解放军“拥有或控制”的公司，从而禁止任何美国公司或个人对其进行投资。
description.en: The U.S. government listed COMAC as a company "owned or controlled" by the People's Liberation Army, thereby prohibiting any U.S. company or individual from investing in it.

relationships.target: 中国商用飞机有限责任公司

description.zh-cn: 上海飞机设计研究院是中国商用飞机有限责任公司下辖的设计研发中心。
description.en: Shanghai Aircraft Design and Research Institute is the design and research center under COMAC.

description.en: Shanghai Aircraft Manufacturing Co., Ltd. is the final assembly and manufacturing center under COMAC.

description.en: Shanghai Aircraft Customer Service Co., Ltd. is the customer service center under COMAC.

relationships.source: 中国商用飞机有限责任公司

description.zh-cn: 中国商飞与港机集团签订合作备忘录，在飞机机身、部件及物料管理服务方面建立合作关系。
description.en: COMAC and HAECO Group signed a memorandum of understanding to establish a cooperative relationship in airframe, component, and material management services.
